Description: A small motorized cart moves inward along a rotating air track, changing the system’s rotation rate.
A maintenance drone crawls toward the hub of a spinning space station antenna, altering its angular velocity.

Context: Rotating Lab Arm with Sliding Mass
Description: A small mass released near the center of a spinning lab rod slides outward, slowing the rotation.

Context: Turntable with Sliding Bead on a Rod
Description: A bead placed near the axis of a rotating rod slides outward along it as the turntable spins.

Context: Docking Capsules on a Rotating Station
Description: Two supply pods dock symmetrically on a rotating station’s central rod, reducing its spin rate.
Two small masses drop from guides onto a freely rotating bar, changing its angular speed.
